name: looking upward
description:
looking upward is a game about, well, looking upward on a starry night. It's a simple, relaxed game in which a player can look through a sky full of stars and click on planes or satellites to take control of them. Go fast, go slow, narrowly avoid crashing into stars (because planes & satellites do crash into stars), or create some grand imaginative scheme about two airplanes in love.

Thanks for playing!
